Comment: Security headers policy for Psychometric Trainer
Name: psychometric-trainer-security-headers

ContentSecurityPolicy.ContentSecurityPolicy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://*.sentry.io; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: blob:; connect-src 'self' https://*.sentry.io https://www.google-analytics.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
